00041 #include <stdio.h>
00042 #include <math.h>
00043 #include "memvirtu.h"
00044 #include "lowparam.h"
00045 #include "lowmacro.h"
00046 #include "lowsolid.h"
00047 #include "vectorop.h"
00048 #include "sethmain.h"
00049 
00050 /* Reclassification of "on-"sectors */
00051 void MSD_lowSetOpVVReclassifySectors(int op)
00052 {
00053    HPTYPE ha;
00054    HPTYPE hb;
00055    int    i, j, nonopposite, newsa, newsb;
00056    int    secta, prevsecta, nextsecta;
00057    int    sectb, prevsectb, nextsectb;
00058    vector vha, vhb;
00059 
00060 #ifdef TRACE_BOOLEAN22
00061    static char *ff[] = { "OUT", "ON ", "IN " };
00062 #endif
00063 
00064    for (i = 0; i < nsectors; ++i)
00065    {
00066       if ((SetSecs1a(i) == USP_ON) && (SetSecs2a(i) == USP_ON) &&
00067           (SetSecs1b(i) == USP_ON) && (SetSecs2b(i) == USP_ON))
00068       {
00069          secta     = SetSecA(i);
00070          sectb     = SetSecB(i);
00071          prevsecta = (secta == 0) ? nnba - 1 : secta - 1;
00072          prevsectb = (sectb == 0) ? nnbb - 1 : sectb - 1;
00073          nextsecta = (secta == nnba - 1) ? 0 : secta + 1;
00074          nextsectb = (sectb == nnbb - 1) ? 0 : sectb + 1;
00075          ha        = SetANBHe(secta);
00076          hb        = SetBNBHe(sectb);
00077 
00078 #ifdef TRACE_BOOLEAN22
00079          fprintf(trace, "\nPASSO 1 ***\n");
00080          fprintf(trace, "par numero %2d  - sec.s1a == ON && sec.s1b == ON\n", i);
00081          fprintf(trace, "                 sec.s1b == ON && sec.s2b == ON\n");
00082          fprintf(trace, "               - secta     = %2d\n", secta);
00083          fprintf(trace, "               - sectb     = %2d\n", sectb);
00084          fprintf(trace, "               - prevsecta = %2d\n", prevsecta);
00085          fprintf(trace, "               - prevsectb = %2d\n", prevsectb);
00086          fprintf(trace, "               - nextsecta = %2d\n", nextsecta);
00087          fprintf(trace, "               - nextsectb = %2d\n", nextsectb);
00088 #endif
00089 
00090          veccopy(vha, FacFeq(LooLFace(HalWLoop(ha))));
00091          veccopy(vhb, FacFeq(LooLFace(HalWLoop(hb))));
00092          nonopposite = vecequal(vha, vhb);
00093          if (nonopposite)
00094          {
00095 #ifdef TRACE_BOOLEAN22
00096             fprintf(trace, "               - faces nao opostas!\n");
00097 #endif
00098 
00099             newsa = (op == USP_UNION) ? USP_OUT : USP_IN;
00100             newsb = (op == USP_UNION) ? USP_IN  : USP_OUT;
00101          }
00102          else
00103          {
00104 #ifdef TRACE_BOOLEAN22
00105             fprintf(trace, "               - faces opostas!\n");
00106 #endif
00107 
00108             newsa = (op == USP_UNION) ? USP_IN : USP_OUT;
00109             newsb = (op == USP_UNION) ? USP_IN : USP_OUT;
00110          }
00111 
00112          for (j = 0; j < nsectors; ++j)
00113          {
00114 #ifdef TRACE_BOOLEAN22
00115             fprintf(trace, "*** j = %2d\n", j);
00116 #endif
00117             if ((SetSecA(j) == prevsecta) && (SetSecB(j) == sectb))
00118             {
00119                if (SetSecs1a(j) != USP_ON)
00120                {
00121 #ifdef TRACE_BOOLEAN22
00122                   fprintf(trace, "*** sec.secta == prevsecta && sec.sectb == sectb\n");
00123                   fprintf(trace, "--> sec[%2d].s2a = %4s\n", j, ff[newsa + 1]);
00124 #endif
00125                   SetSecs2a(j) = newsa;
00126                }
00127             }
00128 
00129             if ((SetSecA(j) == nextsecta) && (SetSecB(j) == sectb))
00130             {
00131                if (SetSecs2a(j) != USP_ON)
00132                {
00133 #ifdef TRACE_BOOLEAN22
00134                   fprintf(trace, "*** sec.nextsecta == prevsecta && sec.sectb == sectb\n");
00135                   fprintf(trace, "--> sec[%2d].s1a = %4s\n", j, ff[newsa + 1]);
00136 #endif
00137                   SetSecs1a(j) = newsa;
00138                }
00139             }
00140 
00141             if ((SetSecA(j) == secta) && (SetSecB(j) == prevsectb))
00142             {
00143                if (SetSecs1b(j) != USP_ON)
00144                {
00145 #ifdef TRACE_BOOLEAN22
00146                   fprintf(trace, "*** sec.secta == secta && sec.sectb == prevsectb\n");
00147                   fprintf(trace, "--> sec[%2d].s2b = %4s\n", j, ff[newsb + 1]);
00148 #endif
00149                   SetSecs2b(j) = newsb;
00150                }
00151             }
00152             if ((SetSecA(j) == secta) && (SetSecB(j) == nextsectb))
00153             {
00154                if (SetSecs2b(j) != USP_ON)
00155                {
00156 #ifdef TRACE_BOOLEAN22
00157                   fprintf(trace, "*** sec.secta == secta && sec.sectb == nextsectb\n");
00158                   fprintf(trace, "--> sec[%2d].s1b = %4s\n", j, ff[newsb + 1]);
00159 #endif
00160                   SetSecs1b(j) = newsb;
00161                }
00162             }
00163             if ((SetSecs1a(j) == SetSecs2a(j)) &&
00164                 ((SetSecs1a(j) == USP_IN) || (SetSecs1a(j) == USP_OUT)))
00165             {
00166 #ifdef TRACE_BOOLEAN22
00167                fprintf(trace, "*** sec.s1a == sec.s2a != ON\n");
00168                fprintf(trace, "--> sec[%2d].intersect = 0\n", j);
00169 #endif
00170                SetSecInter(j) = 0;
00171             }
00172             if ((SetSecs1b(j) == SetSecs2b(j)) &&
00173                 ((SetSecs1b(j) == USP_IN) || (SetSecs1b(j) == USP_OUT)))
00174             {
00175 #ifdef TRACE_BOOLEAN22
00176                fprintf(trace, "*** sec.s1b == sec.s2b != ON\n");
00177                fprintf(trace, "--> sec[%2d].intersect = 0\n", j);
00178 #endif
00179                SetSecInter(j) = 0;
00180             }
00181          }
00182 #ifdef TRACE_BOOLEAN22
00183          fprintf(trace, "--> sec[%2d].s1a = sec[%2d].s2a = %4s\n", i, i, ff[newsa + 1]);
00184          fprintf(trace, "--> sec[%2d].s1b = sec[%2d].s2b = %4s\n", i, i, ff[newsb + 1]);
00185          fprintf(trace, "--> sec[%2d].intersect = 0\n", i);
00186 #endif
00187          SetSecs1a(i)   = SetSecs2a(i) = newsa;
00188          SetSecs1b(i)   = SetSecs2b(i) = newsb;
00189          SetSecInter(i) = 0;
00190       }
00191    }
00192 }
